00153 /**
00154  * @def TO_CSMA
00155  * @brief Timeout for any CSMA/CCA process. [ms]
00156  *
00157  * This timeout runs after sending a packet. If the timer expire
00158  * the transmission is cancled and restarted with disabled CSMA/CCA.
00159  *
00160  */
00161 #define TO_CSMA 5

00177 /**
00178  * @def SendMsgUp
00179  * @brief Callback function of upper layer.
00180  *
00181  * This function is called when the physical layer wants to forward received
00182  * data to the next upper layer. This define is used to be able to add
00183  * another layer.
00184  *
00185  */
00186 #define SendMsgUp (*phySendMsgUp)
